sqlMap.select: SELECT ETL_DT AS etlDt , SEQ_ID AS seqId , POI_NM AS poiNm , UNIQ_POP AS uniqPop , CONGESTION AS congestion FROM GEO_BEACH_CONGESTION WHERE ETL_DT = (SELECT MAX(ETL_DT) FROM GEO_BEACH_CONGESTION)

SELECT a.etl_dt AS etlDt, a.poi_nm AS poiNm, a.uniq_pop AS uniqPop FROM geo_beach_congestion a JOIN geo_beach_congestion_destination b ON a.seq_id = b.seq_id WHERE b.destId = #destId# AND (a.etl_dt LIKE CONCAT ('%',#datestrtemp#,'%') or a.etl_dt LIKE CONCAT ('%',#datestrtemp2#,'%'));
SELECT ETL_DT AS etlDt , SEQ_ID AS seqId , POI_NM AS poiNm , UNIQ_POP AS uniqPop , CONGESTION AS congestion FROM GEO_BEACH_CONGESTION WHERE ETL_DT = #datestr#
SELECT ETL_DT AS etlDt , SEQ_ID AS seqId , POI_NM AS poiNm , UNIQ_POP AS uniqPop , CONGESTION AS congestion FROM GEO_BEACH_CONGESTION WHERE ETL_DT = (SELECT MAX(ETL_DT) FROM GEO_BEACH_CONGESTION)
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO GEO_BEACH_CONGESTION ( ETL_DT , SEQ_ID , POI_NM , UNIQ_POP , CONGESTION ) VALUES ( #etlDt# , #seqId# , #poiNm# , #uniqPop# , #congestion# )
sqlMap.select: SELECT AREA AS area FROM GEO_BEACH_INFO
SELECT ETL_DT AS etlDt , SEQ_ID AS seqId , POI_NM AS poiNm , UNIQ_POP AS uniqPop FROM GEO_BEACH_CONGESTION WHERE ETL_DT = #datestr#
SELECT count(*) AS cnt FROM GEO_BEACH_CONGESTION WHERE ETL_DT = #datestr#

SELECT dest_id , dest_title , dest_ad_slogan , dest_region , dest_category , dest_tag , dest_website_url , dest_img_path , dest_phone , dest_address , dest_axis_x , dest_axis_y , dest_information , dest_season , dest_feature , dest_description , dest_recomm_point , dest_clip_point , dest_writer , dest_reg_datetime , dest_hit FROM geo_destination WHERE 1=1

SELECT a.rout_id AS routId , a.rout_title AS routTitle , a.rout_reg_member AS routRegMember , a.rout_region AS routRegion , a.rout_thumb_path AS routThumbPath , a.rout_memo AS routMemo , a.rout_hit AS routHit , a.rout_type AS routType , a.rout_open AS routOpen , a.rout_reg_date AS routRegDate , b.mbr_nm AS routRegMemberNm FROM geo_travel_route a LEFT JOIN jnitcmsmbr b ON a.rout_reg_member=b.mbr_id where 1=1

SELECT rout_id AS routId , rout_days AS routDays , rout_start_point AS routStartPoint , rout_start_axis AS routStartAxis , rout_dest_point AS routDestPoint , rout_dest_axis AS routDestAxis , rout_way_point AS routWayPoint FROM geo_travel_route_daily WHERE 1=1
